SEARCH
Package com.syncura360.controller

Class ScheduleController

java.lang.Object
com.syncura360.controller.ScheduleController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins="*") @RequestMapping("/schedule") public class ScheduleController extends Object
Handles CRUD operations for staff scheduling. This controller allows scheduling shifts for hospital staff, including adding, updating, retrieving, and deleting shifts. The operations are protected by authentication and authorization mechanisms.
Author:
Benjamin Leiby

    • ScheduleController

      public ScheduleController(StaffRepository staffRepository, ScheduleRepository scheduleRepository, ScheduleService scheduleService, JwtUtil jwtUtil)
      Constructor to inject dependencies of the ScheduleController.
      Parameters:
      staffRepository - the repository for accessing staff data.
      scheduleRepository - the repository for accessing scheduling data.
      scheduleService - the service for managing schedules.
      jwtUtil - utility class for working with JWT tokens.

  • Method Details

    • getStaffSchedule

      @PostMapping("/staff") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ScheduleDto> getStaffSchedule(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String authorization, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid StaffScheduleRequestDTO staffScheduleRequestDTO, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Retrieves the schedule for a specific staff member based on the provided time range.
      Parameters:
      authorization - the JWT token for authentication.
      staffScheduleRequestDTO - the data transfer object (DTO) that contains the schedule request details.
      bindingResult - the result of the validation of the input data.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a ScheduleDto with the staff's schedule or error message.

    • updateShifts

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ScheduleController.MessageResponse> updateShifts(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String authorization, @RequestBody ShiftUpdateRequestDto shiftUpdateRequestDto)
      Updates the shifts for a given set of shifts.
      Parameters:
      authorization - the JWT token for authentication.
      shiftUpdateRequestDto - the DTO containing the details of the shifts to update.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a ScheduleController.MessageResponse with the result of the operation.

    • getAllShifts

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ScheduleDto> getAllShifts(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String authorization, @RequestBody ShiftDto shiftDto)
      Retrieves all shifts based on the specified time range and search criteria.
      Parameters:
      authorization - the JWT token for authentication.
      shiftDto - the DTO containing the search criteria for the shifts.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a ScheduleDto with the list of shifts or error message.

    • addShifts

      @PostMapping("/new") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ScheduleController.MessageResponse> addShifts(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String authorization, @RequestBody ShiftsRequest newShiftsRequest)
      Attempts to add a list of new shifts to the schedule.
      Parameters:
      authorization - the JWT token for authentication.
      newShiftsRequest - the DTO containing the list of new shifts.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a ScheduleController.MessageResponse with the success or failure message.

    • deleteShifts

      @DeleteMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ScheduleController.MessageResponse> deleteShifts(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String authorization, @RequestBody ShiftsRequest deleteShiftsRequest)
      Attempts to delete a list of shifts from the schedule.
      Parameters:
      authorization - the JWT token for authentication.
      deleteShiftsRequest - the DTO containing the list of shifts to delete.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a ScheduleController.MessageResponse with the success or failure message.

    • createShiftDTOs

      private List<ShiftDto> createShiftDTOs(List<Schedule> shifts)
      Creates a list of ShiftDto objects from a list of Schedule objects.
      Parameters:
      shifts - the list of Schedule objects to convert.
      Returns:
      a list of ShiftDto objects.

    • getShiftToModify

      private Schedule getShiftToModify(ShiftUpdateDto dto, int hospitalId)
      Retrieves the shift to modify based on the provided data and hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      dto - the DTO containing the shift update data.
      hospitalId - the ID of the hospital.
      Returns:
      the Schedule object to modify.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the shift is not found.
      org.springframework.security.authentication.InsufficientAuthenticationException - if the hospital ID does not match.

    • getNewShift

      private Schedule getNewShift(ShiftDto updates, Schedule shiftToModify) throws SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException
      Creates a new shift based on the updates provided and the shift to modify.
      Parameters:
      updates - the DTO containing the shift updates.
      shiftToModify - the existing shift to modify.
      Returns:
      the new Schedule object after applying the updates.
      Throws:
      SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException - if the new shift data violates database constraints.
